abstract: Twitter was the victim of a hacker attack that has apparently exposed confidential corporate information.
snippet: Twitter was the victim of a hacker attack that has apparently exposed confidential corporate information.
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:54 p.m. TechCrunch has published some financial projections of Twitter. For the end of 2013: 1 billion users, $1.54 billion in revenue, 5,200 employees and $111 million in net earnings. More information at end of this post.

byline.original: By Claire Cain Miller and Brad Stone
